titles.title: West African Ebola Relief Act
West African Ebola Relief Act
To extend temporary protected status for certain nationals of Liberia, Sierra Leone, and Guinea until November 21, 2018.
West African Ebola Relief Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Border Security.

bill.summary:
West African Ebola Relief Act
This bill extends the temporary protected status through November 21, 2018, for a national of Liberia, Sierra Leone, or Guinea, who was lawfully present in the United States under such status on May 19, 2017.
